statusLine.command: IP=$(tailscale ip -4 2>/dev/null || echo localhost); echo TODO:http://$IP:5565

hooks.command: tmux set-option -t $TMUX_PANE -p window-style 'bg=#1a0000,fg=#aaaaaa' && tmux set-option -t $TMUX_PANE -p window-active-style 'bg=#1a0000,fg=#00ff00' 2>/dev/null || true
tmux set-option -t $TMUX_PANE -p window-style 'bg=#000020,fg=#aaaaaa' && tmux set-option -t $TMUX_PANE -p window-active-style 'bg=#000020,fg=#00ff00' 2>/dev/null || true
